segments.text: I'm looking out the window above the sink, and it's so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A tidy garden path with lovely bushes stretches into the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world seems utterly serene and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a stark contrast to the utter chaos unfolding inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the sink, creating a massive puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing in it, drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on a stool that looks like it could collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can so much go wrong simultaneously in one small space?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wonder what other small disasters are brewing unseen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sense of impending doom in here is almost palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach in and turn off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That calm garden seems like a distant, unattainable dream right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
